biotools.summary:
Visualization of the Dynamics of Histone Modifications and Their Crosstalk Using PTM-CrossTalkMapper.

R scripts to create crosstalk maps that visualize multi-layered proteoform data.

PTM-CrossTalkMapper is a flexible toolkit to visualize multi-layered quantitative post-transcriptional modification (PTM) data. The preprint manuscript can be found on bioRxiv

bioschemas.name: PTM-CrossTalkMapper
